mapper.select: select count(*) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and DATEDIFF(NOW(),gtm_create)=#{dayNum}
select sum(like_num) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1
select sum(comments_num) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1
select count(*) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1
select count(*) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and to_days(gtm_create) = to_days(now())
select count(*) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and DATE_FORMAT(gtm_create,"%Y%m")=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE( ),"%Y%m")
select count(*) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and YEAR(gtm_create)=YEAR(NOW())
select count(*) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and DATEDIFF(gtm_create,NOW())=-1
select count(*) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and PERIOD_DIFF(date_format(now(),"%Y%m") , date_format(gtm_create,"%Y%m")) =1
select count(*) from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and year(gtm_create)=year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year));
select show_id,blog_file_name from blog_blogcontent where cid = #{cid}
select cid, title,blog_type,status, author, gtm_create, gtm_modified,show_id,article_editor from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and cid < #{cid} order by cid desc limit 1
select cid, title,blog_type,status, author, gtm_create, gtm_modified,show_id,article_editor from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and cid > #{cid} order by cid asc limit 1

select cid, title,blog_type,cover,images, comments_num,like_num,browse_num, status, author, gtm_create, gtm_modified,show_id, show_introduction, scroll_recommended,special_recommended,recommended,article_editor from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 and special_recommended=0 order by gtm_create desc limit #{0}

select cid, title,blog_type,cover,images, comments_num,like_num,browse_num, status, author, gtm_create, gtm_modified,show_id, show_introduction, scroll_recommended,special_recommended,recommended,article_editor from blog_blogcontent where status = 1 order by browse_num desc limit #{0}
